name: AirPods Max
info: The over-ear headphone has been completely reimagined. From cushion to canopy, AirPods Max are designed for an uncompromising fit that creates the optimal acoustic seal for many different head shapes — fully immersing you in every sound.

name: AirPods Pro
info: The Apple-designed H2 chip is the force behind the advanced audio performance of AirPods Pro, working with the driver and amplifier to create crisp, high-definition sound. It uses computational algorithms to deliver noise cancellation, superior three-dimensional sound and efficient battery life — all at once.

name: AirPods
info: AirPods, the Lightning Charging Case and the MagSafe Charging Case are rated IPX4 sweat and water resistant, so they’ll withstand anything from rain to heavy workouts

name: AirPods
info: With plenty of talk and listen time, voice-activated Siri access and an available wireless charging case, AirPods deliver an incredible wireless headphone experience. Put them in your ears and they connect immediately, immersing you in rich, high-quality sound. Just like magic.
